DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate treatments designed to improve cocaine treatment success by combining medications that target cocaine-related cognitive impairments.
DOC.criteria: meet criteria for cocaine dependence seeking treatment for cocaine dependence be in acceptable health based on medical history and physical exam dependent on drugs other than cocaine, nicotine, marijuana have a medical condition contraindicating treatment with study medications having conditions of probation or parole requiring reports of drug use to officers of the court
